directions: Mix together the banana, red pepper, green pepper, yellow pepper, cilantro, green onion, lime juice, brown sugar, ginger, olive oil, and habanero pepper in a bowl; season with salt. Serve within 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 large firm banana, peeled and diced
½ cup red bell pepper, seeded and diced
½ cup green bell pepper, seeded and diced
½ cup yellow bell pepper, seeded and diced
title: Hot Banana Salsa
